data.name: lblcfgroupselect.HelpText
data.value: Select a custom fields group based on which articles will be searched.

data.name: lblFilterAuthors.HelpText
data.value: This option enables searching of articles from all authors or selected authors. To select authors whose articles you want to search, uncheck the option 'Search from all authors' and select authors.

data.name: lblFilterCategories.HelpText
data.value: This option enables searching of articles in all categories and in selected categories. To select categories in which you want to search for articles, uncheck the option 'Search through categories' and select categories.

data.name: lblNumberOfCharacters.HelpText
data.value: Number of characters in display result.

data.name: lblNumberOfCharacters.Text
data.value: Number of characters to display in result:

data.name: lblSearchButtonPosition.HelpText
data.value: Select a position of a search button in relation to a search textbox. Possible choices are Outside search textbox and Inside search textbox.

data.name: lblSearchWay.HelpText
data.value: Select parts of an article which will be searched.

data.name: lblSelectDisplayStyle.HelpText
data.value: Select a display style for the selected theme.

data.name: lblSelectModuleInstance.HelpText
data.value: Articles will open in selected module instance.

data.name: lblSelectNewsModule.HelpText
data.value: Search results will be displayed in a selected module instance.

data.name: lblSelectTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select a theme (design) for this module.

data.name: cvAuthorsTreeview.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please select at least one author.

data.name: cvCategoriesTreeview.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please select at least one category.

data.name: lblAutoComplete.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, a suggestion list will be offered during an input and before a search.

data.name: NoNewsInstance.Text
data.value: No News Instance, please add news module instance.

data.name: NoNewsInstancePortal.Text
data.value: No news instance with selected portal sharing. Please edit news module instance settings and set portal sharing.

data.name: NoSharingPortalInstance.Text
data.value: No news instance with selected portal sharing. Please edit news module instance settings and set portal sharing.

data.name: NoSharingPortalInstance2.Text
data.value: No News Instance, please add news module instance.

data.name: lblDisplayHeader.HelpText
data.value: This option enables displaying of a header text from a resource file ().

data.name: lblCategoryCFGroupItems.Text
data.value: Connect article categories with CF groups:

data.name: lblCategoryCFGroupItems.HelpText
data.value: Here you can attach different custom field groups to each article category. In this case, during the selection of category, the search option in the Advances search module will be changed per selected category.

data.name: lblSearchFilterBy.HelpText
data.value: Using this option you can set whether this module instance will search only for articles, only events or both.

data.name: lblShowOnlyEventsLimit.HelpText
data.value: Set the criteria to search events whose start date has ended. The option 'Show all' will search all events, disregarding the fact that they have already ended. We can enter the number of days to be set in the past for past events in the field 'Limit to number of days in the past'. If the set value is 0, the criterion for the event's searching will be the current date. In that case, neither of the past events will be searched.

data.name: lblSearchOnlySelectedCFGroup.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, only articles that contain the selected custom fields group will be searched. If this option isn’t enabled, all articles that contain a custom field based on which the search is conducted, will be searched, but a custom fields group won’t be taken in consideration. Notice: a same custom field can be in different custom fields groups.

data.name: lblSearchOnlySelectedCFGroup.Text
data.value: Search only articles containing selected CF group:

data.name: lblClearButton.HelpText
data.value: It displays the button that resets the search settings of the Advanced search module.

data.name: lblSearchBarOrientation.HelpText
data.value: Select the orientation of a search bar. The orientation can be vertical or horizontal.

data.name: NoCustomFieldGroupCreated.Text
data.value: No custom field group created. Create group and add some custom fields with property 'is searcable' ON.

data.name: lblSearchType.HelpText
data.value: Select a search type. The simple search enables searching articles based on a term or a phrase.The advanced search enables searching and filtering of articles based on values in custom fields. The settings of the advanced search can't be saved if a custom field group is not selected.

data.name: lititlearticledocumentslinks.Text
data.value: Search title, subtitle, article, documents and links

data.name: lblModuleVisibility.HelpText
data.value: Here you can set when you wish the module to be visible on the page. If 'Module always visible' option is selected, the module is visible all the time. If 'Show module only when the news module displays the list of articles' option is selected, the module will only be visible when the news module displays the list of articles, yet it won't be visible when article details are displayed. If 'Show module only when the news module displays article details' option is selected, the module will only be visible when article details are displayed, yet it won't be visible when the list of articles is displayed. Note: The module is always visible to admin and host users.

data.name: lblIsSocialInstance.HelpText
data.value: Displays user's and group's articles on the Activity feed. The articles are filtered by the UserID or GroupID querystring. If this option is enabled and the querystring UserID or GroupID is missing, then the articles won't show up.

data.name: lblHideUnlocalizedItems.HelpText
data.value: Articles and events without translation for a particular language will not be displayed when users browsing the site in this language.
